supply.supply_status: Strained - Weak motorization (only 1,200 trucks vs 1,500+ for panzer divisions). Extended supply lines from Tripoli (~950 km) via coastal road. Division hastily assembled from disparate units with limited organic transport. Heavily reliant on captured British vehicles and equipment. Supply base: Tripoli with forward dumps at Derna, Tmimi, and Gazala. Water critical constraint at 10L/man/day minimum.
